abstract: Economic data, corporate earnings, industry announcements, government hearings and international business developments coming this week.
snippet: Economic data, corporate earnings, industry announcements, government hearings and international business developments coming this week.
lead_paragraph: ECONOMIC REPORTS There will be reports this week on existing-home sales for February (Tuesday); durable goods orders for February and new-home sales for February (Wednesday); weekly jobless claims (Thursday); and fourth-quarter gross domestic product (final revise), and the Reuters/University of Michigan consumer confidence index for March (Friday).

abstract: Three employees of Rio Tinto, the British-Australian mining giant, agreed to plead guilty Monday to taking bribes while working for the company in China, stunning confessions on the opening day of their three-day trial here.
snippet: Three employees of Rio Tinto, the British-Australian mining giant, agreed to plead guilty Monday to taking bribes while working for the company in China, stunning confessions on the opening day of their three-day trial here.
lead_paragraph: Three employees of Rio Tinto, the British-Australian mining giant, agreed to plead guilty Monday to taking bribes while working for the company in China, stunning confessions on the opening day of their three-day trial here.

headline.main: China Begins Trial of 4 Rio Tinto Employees
